#### Background
The Canadian Government Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) are seeking a contractor to provide office furniture for the Halifax, Nova Scotia, location. The project will cover the purchase, delivery, and installation of the furniture by July 10, 2024. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who have previously bid on this solicitation.

#### Requirements
This procurement requires a product category 6- collaborative furniture, and a security requirement is associated with the requirement. Only suppliers who are pre-qualified and have been issued a Supply Arrangement (SA) are eligible to bid. Suppliers who are non- SA holders may submit a bid but must also submit an arrangement to the Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA) for evaluation.

#### How to Participate
Bidders interested in participating should contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca to inquire about becoming a pre-qualified SA holder.
